shake-up. Current Google CEO Eric Schmidt will serve as the company's executive chairman. Co-founder Sergey Brin will devote his time to strategic projects, in particular working on new products, the company said. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a statement.`` By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry Page is ready to lead and I'm excited

2011, 22:16 EST Google announced Thursday that co-founder Larry Page would replace Eric Schmidt as chief executive of the Internet giant in April. Google said Eric Schmidt would remain with the company as executive chairman and focus on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships. The firm's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , will work on strategic projects and new products, Google said in a statement. It said the management changes would take effect on April 4.

by thieves who climbed up a fire escape and then used ropes to lower themselves into the museum. The thieves appear to have carefully selected some of the most valuable objects while ignoring less important artefacts. They are not something you would come and randomly find, an Egyptologist at Cairo's American University, Salima Ikram Said Salima Ikram , told Reuters. Restoration work has already started at the museum to repair the damage by looters. Zahi Hawass said that 70 pieces were damaged.
